title: Equities
content:
Video Lecture Equities Equities
Description: This video lecture provides an overview of equities and models for pricing equities, with a focus on using the dividend discount model.
Slides Equities Slides 1–23 (PDF)
Video for Equities covers slides 1–9 Please note that slides 10–23 are not covered in the video lectures but can be reviewed independently. These slides present examples involving the dividend discount model, earnings-per-share and price-earnings ratios, and growth stocks.
